question: Virat Kohli and who among the following found a place in the Wisden's leading cricketers of the year?
explanation: Virat Kohli and Mithali Raj, captains of Indian men and women's cricket team respectively found a place in the Wisden's leading cricketers of the year. Virat Kohli and Mithali Raj were named the leading men's and women's cricketers in the world respectively. Five cricketers were chosen for the 'Cricketers of the Year Award'. Three of them were women cricketers. England's women cricketers Heather Knight, Natalie Sciver and Anya Shrubsole have been selected for Wisden's Five Cricketers of the Year. West Indies batsman Shai Hope and Essex bowler Jamie Porter were also chosen for Wisden's Five Cricketers of the Year.
